page.title: 18Traffic Survey
page.content: A busy road passes through the village of Lower Beeding - in one direction it leads to Handcross, M23 and Gatwick Airport and in the other to Horsham or the A272, whih crosses Sussex from east to west. A traffic survey conducted by the children of Holy Trinity School on Wednesday 10th July l985 produced the following results: 9.15 - 9.45 - Vehicles travelling east Cars - 125 Buses/coaches - 3 Heavy lorries - 7 Medium lorries - 13 Light lorries/vans - 14 Motor/pedal bicycles- 6 Total - 168 Vehicles travelling west and south Cars - 116 Buses/ coaches - 1 Heavy lorries - 6
